discussion.p: In the listing of , table 108: Header <cmath> synopsis I miss the following C99 functions (from 7.12.11.2):

blockquote.pre: float nanf(const char *tagp); long double nanl(const char *tagp);

discussion.p: (Note: These functions cannot be overloaded and they are also not listed anywhere else)

resolution.p: In , table 108, section "Functions", add nanf and nanl just after the existing entry nan.
